tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE approved_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES approved_suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    supplier_id UUID REFERENCES approved_suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID REFERENCES products(product_id),
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    total_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ApprovedSuppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE ApprovedProducts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES ApprovedSuppliers(supplier_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES ApprovedProducts(product_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductCategories (
    product_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES Categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Products(product_id)
);
